name: 楊克訓
objective: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1.MOSFETs 2.BJTs 3.Single Stage IC Amplifiers 4.Differential and Multistage Amplifiers 5.Feedback
schedule:
第1~2週:MOSFETs
第3~6週:BJTs
第7~10週:Single Stage IC Amplifiers
第9週:Midterm Exam.
第11~14週:Differential and Multistage Amplifiers
第15~17週:Feedback
第18週:Final Exam.
materials:
Text: Adel S. Sedra & Kenneth C.Smith, Microelectronic Circuits,5th Edition, Oxford University Press,2004
References: 1.J. Millman & A. Grabel, Microelectronics,2nd Edition, McGraw Hill,1988
2.D. A. Neamen, Electronic Circuit Analysis and Design,2nd Edition,McGraw Hill,2001
